messages.subject: Texas unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I m not Aimee but I am in Texas. I am in Brenham. Half way between Houston & Austin. I had difficulty finding unschoolers also. I registered with this
messages.messageBody:
Hi,
I'm not Aimee but I am in Texas. I am in Brenham. Half way between Houston & Austin. I had difficulty finding unschoolers also. I registered with this group & found some within 20 miles of me. They show some unschoolers in San Antonio.

http://www.homeschoolmedia.com/register/index.phtml


Hey Aimee,

I had about given up hope of finding another unschooler in TX. I really do
love it, wouldn't live anywhere else (tried it and was so homesick) but you
do have to develop a thick skin and a strong sense of self.

We live just north of San Antonio in the southern Hill Country. We have
family in Amarillo and are up there quite often. Where are you?

Julie





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
